overview: Rugstore is a premium online store promoting and selling antique rugs. The store offers a versatile collection of rugs, with timeless pieces ranging from Caucasian and Turkish to Anatolian and Turkoman. The weavings are done in various countries, adding an international flavour to them. The store is promoted by Kazim Yildiz, a pioneer in the oriental rugs and carpet trading industry for over 25 years. Rugstore has established a reputation for being a market leader, with its fine pieces serving clients for years together without the shine wearing off them. Clients are assured of finding the piece they seek, with fitting dimensions and pristine cuts. They get to choose the colours in which they prefer their rugs.
